job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the process of using human knowledge to enhance an AI system, which aligns with the definition of improving or fine-tuning AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback on AI-generated solutions, which is a core aspect of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration, even if the tools are AI-related.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI capabilities into a support system, which is a software development and integration task.

soft_skills.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
soft_skills.justification: The phrase implies a need to learn and adapt to AI's limitations and actively improve the system, indicating a requirement for learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
soft_skills.justification: Participating in fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback requires learning about the AI's performance and adapting based on that feedback.

soft_skills.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies inherently requires learning and adapting to new approaches.

soft_skills.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
soft_skills.justification: Analyzing complex tickets and applying expertise to improve AI systems are clear indicators of problem-solving skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
soft_skills.justification: Focusing on complex issues that AI cannot resolve and integrating expertise points to a strong problem-solving orientation.

soft_skills.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
soft_skills.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools suggests an innovative approach and taking initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: The aggressive ramp-up expectation highlights the need for rapid learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on being able to unblock oneself directly points to problem-solving and self-reliance.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on improving and fine-tuning AI models, analyzing AI-generated solutions, and applying human expertise to areas where AI falls short. While there's mention of prototyping and integrating AI tools, the core emphasis is on the development and refinement of AI capabilities rather than building broader software applications around them. The tasks align more with the 'Model Development & Fine-Tuning' category (1.B.1) than with 'Software Development & Integration' (1.A.1). There are no explicit mentions of traditional ML tasks, but the focus on improving AI systems and fine-tuning models leans towards a specialist role in AI model enhancement, fitting the 'ML Specialist (Data Scientist)' profile, albeit with a GenAI focus implied by the context of 'AI systems' and 'AI-generated solutions'.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines tasks related to AI model improvement and fine-tuning. However, it lacks specific technical tools or detailed descriptions of the AI models being used, which prevents a perfect score. The profile assignment is based on the nature of the tasks described, which are more focused on AI model enhancement than general software engineering.
